item.title: [Pi] Help with Summoning - Clicking Npc Opens Bank
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“c o l d, post:7, topic:404362”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=501409.msg3668453#msg3668453 date=1310759404]
ActionHandler,

public void firstClickNpc

case NPC_ID: c.getPA().openUpBank(); break;
[/quote]

Actually it was:

But thanks.

Also thanks metal k0, you pointed me in the right direction in the first place.[/quote]
Alright, Well I just wrote that off memory.
Glad I could help.

item.title: [Pi] Help with Summoning - Clicking Npc Opens Bank
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Ok, so I have a base setup for summoning (you click a pouch>spawns npc>npc follows you.)
It needs work I know.
OT: I’ve added Pack Yak’s and I want to make them open your bank when clicked. Where should I add this code? (I will improve the code once I know where to add it)

I’ve tried actionhandler.java

[code] case 1408:
if (c.hasNpc == true && c.summonId == 1408) {
c.getPA().openUpBank();

		}
		break;[/code]

The code is pretty basic i dont think it needs explaining.

Also here is the ints for the Pack Yak:

if(i == 1408) { entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[2] = "Store"; entityDef.actions[3] = "Dismiss"; entityDef.models = new int[1]; entityDef.models[0] = 51852; entityDef.name = "Pack yak"; entityDef.anInt91 = 125;//width entityDef.anInt86 = 125;//height entityDef.aByte68 = 2; entityDef.description = "Its a Pack yak.".getBytes(); }

Finaly here is a picture of it:

Anything helps don’t be shy to post please.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] Help with Summoning - Clicking Npc Opens Bank
